assessment_item.title: In patients with metastatic colorectal cancer, what is among the most important predictors for recurrence after resection of liver metastases?
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

In patients with metastatic colorectal cancer, what is among the most important predictors for recurrence after resection of liver metastases?

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

Number of liver metastases

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1493"},{"text":"

The progression of the primary colorectal cancer

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1494"},{"text":"

Presence of pulmonary metastases

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1504"},{"text":"

Achievement of a simultaneous resection rather than a staged resection

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:1509"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":false,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"In patients with metastatic colorectal cancer, what is among the most important predictors for recurrence after resection of liver metastases?
